0.text: Innate: Lulu is assisted by Pix, an  untargetable faerie, who follows her around and fires a barrage of 3 bolts towards her target whenever she uses a basic attack on-attack. Each bolt deals 5 − 39 (based on level) (+ 5% AP) magic damage to the first enemy it collides with, for a total of 15 − 117 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) on hitting a single target with all three bolts.
0.html: Innate: Lulu is assisted by Pix, an untargetable faerie, who follows her around and fires a barrage of 3 bolts towards her target whenever she uses a basic attack on-attack. Each bolt deals 5 − 39 (based on level) (+ 5% AP) magic damage to the first enemy it collides with, for a total of 15 − 117 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) on hitting a single target with all three bolts.
markedPassages: untargetable
5 − 39 (based on level)
15 − 117 (based on level)

1.text: Casting  Help, Pix! on an ally champion transfers Pix's help to them, causing him to fire the bolts dependent on their basic attacks.
1.html: Casting Help, Pix! on an ally champion transfers Pix's help to them, causing him to fire the bolts dependent on their basic attacks.
markedPassages: Help, Pix!

2.text: Pix snaps back to Lulu if she is too far away.
2.html: Pix snaps back to Lulu if she is too far away.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Pix snaps back to Lulu if she is too far away.

0.text: Active: Lulu and  Pix each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing magic damage to enemies hit, reduced to 70% against  minions, and  slowing them by 80% decaying over 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Lulu and Pix each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing magic damage to enemies hit, reduced to 70% against minions, and slowing them by 80% decaying over 2 seconds.
markedPassages: Pix
minions
slowing

1.text: Enemies take  25% damage from a second bolt.
1.html: Enemies take 25% damage from a second bolt.

0.text: Active: Lulu can cast Whimsy on herself or the target champion.
0.html: Active: Lulu can cast Whimsy on herself or the target champion.

1.text: Enemy Cast: Lulu launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that  polymorphs them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and  disarming them for the same duration.
1.html: Enemy Cast: Lulu launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that polymorphs them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and disarming them for the same duration.
markedPassages: polymorphs
disarming

2.text: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  25% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the duration.
2.html: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target  bonus attack speed and  25% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the duration.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
25% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Lulu can cast Help, Pix! on herself or the target unit.
0.html: Active: Lulu can cast Help, Pix! on herself or the target unit.

1.text: Enemy Cast: Lulu sends  Pix to the far side of the target enemy for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage and  revealing them for the same duration.
1.html: Enemy Cast: Lulu sends Pix to the far side of the target enemy for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage and revealing them for the same duration.
markedPassages: Pix
revealing

2.text: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu sends  Pix to the target ally for 6.25 seconds. If the target is a  champion, they are granted a  shield for 2.5 seconds.
2.html: Self / Ally Cast: Lulu sends Pix to the target ally for 6.25 seconds. If the target is a champion, they are granted a shield for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: Pix
champion
shield

0.text: Active: Lulu enlarges herself or the target allied champion,  knocking up nearby enemies for 0.75 seconds. For the next 7 seconds, the target gains  bonus health and 40% increased size and  slows nearby enemies, which lingers for 0.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Lulu enlarges herself or the target allied champion, knocking up nearby enemies for 0.75 seconds. For the next 7 seconds, the target gains  bonus health and 40% increased size and slows nearby enemies, which lingers for 0.25 seconds.

bonus health
